thread.title: Women's soccer | Va. Wesleyan falls to Guilford
thread.title_full: Women's soccer | Va. Wesleyan falls to Guilford | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com

author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: Women's soccer | Va. Wesleyan falls to Guilford
text:
GREENSBORO, N.C. Morgan Henderson scored in the 16th minute and Becca Banks made a career-high 11 saves in the Guilford women's 1-0 ODAC soccer win over Virginia Wesleyan on Saturday.
It was the Marlins' first loss to the Quakers since 2006.
Virginia Wesleyan (9-8, 7-2 ODAC) controlled play for much of the game, especially in the second half, but was unable to cash in.
Virginia Wesleyan will look to bounce back from consecutive ODAC losses on Wednesday with a match-up against No. 4-ranked Lynchburg.
Follow @PilotSportsNow Posted to : Sports
